10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Buhainah said:"The Iqamah for Subh prayer was said, and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saw a man praying while the Mu'adhdhin saying the Iqamah. He said: 'Are you praying Subh with four Rak'ahs?

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ الإِقَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Disapproval of praying when the iqhmah is said
